10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ubadah bin As-Samit said:"When the Messenger of Allah follows a corpse, he would not sit until (the deceased was) placed in the Lahd. A rabbi came upon him and said: 'This is what we do, O Muhammad'" He said: "So the Messenger of Allah sat, and he said: 'Differ from them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْجُلُوسِ قَبْلَ أَنْ تُوضَعَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Sitting Before The Deceased Is Placed In The Grave
